    | text      = We're less...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 02:06:36.180
    | text      = We're more interested in just more people listening.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 02:06:38.420
    | text      = Yeah, each one to each one.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 02:06:40.340
    | text      = Tell your friends.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 02:06:40.979
    | text      = Snitch on the show.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 02:06:42.340
    | text      = Hell yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 02:06:42.979
    | text      = We see the growth that comes from that, and we appreciate it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 02:06:46.500
    | text      = Absolutely.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 02:06:48.979
    | text      = I will say that Desmond is awesome.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 02:06:52.020
    | text      = Never killed anybody.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 02:06:52.979
    | text      = I guarantee Desmond has never killed anybody.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 02:06:55.060
    | text      = I am positive of that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 02:06:57.220
    | text      = 11 years, it's not enough time to have killed somebody, generally speaking.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 02:07:02.659
    | text      = There are exceptions to any rule, but I'm gonna go with Desmond.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 02:07:05.380
    | text      = There are accidental guns you might find around someone's house.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 02:07:08.180
    | text      = But Alex says that doesn't happen.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 02:07:09.619
    | text      = No.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 02:07:10.420
    | text      = I don't think you have the muscle strength to get a good stab in.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 02:07:14.260
    | text      = I might be wrong.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 02:07:15.060
    | text      = Who knows?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 02:07:15.939
    | text      = I mean, maybe on somebody younger than you.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 02:07:17.779
    | text      = I still think that your musculature isn't right for a stab.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 02:07:21.140
    | text      = A good stab is fine.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 02:07:22.500
    | text      = I'm basing this on nothing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 02:07:24.420
    | text      = Good stab is fine.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 02:07:25.939
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 02:07:26.180
    | text      = What did I say?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 02:07:26.979
    | text      = I don't know.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 02:07:27.460
    | text      = My point is that Desmond is awesome has never killed anybody, although he is being attacked
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 02:07:31.699
    | text      = by a guy who technically probably has, and that's Alex Jones.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 02:07:36.659
    | text      = Andy in Kansas.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 02:07:37.619
    | text      = You're on the air.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 02:07:38.100
    | text      = Thanks for holding.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 02:07:40.659
    | text      = Hello, Alex.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 02:07:41.380
    | text      = I'm a first time caller.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 02:07:42.340
    | text      = I'm a huge fan.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 02:07:43.140
    | text      = I love your work.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}
